T11dhkvadnu:976: 03501 asambaddham. na ca utpatti-dharmakatvān nityam ity
T11dhkvadnu:979: 03503 hetu-virodhaḥ. iha tu hetunā pratijñā bādhyata iti pratijñā-virodho
T11dhkvadnu:982: 03506 yad apy uktam etena pratijñayā dṛṣṭānta-virodha-ādayo api
T11dhkvadnu:983: 03507 vaktavyā bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyena iti tatra api pakṣīkṛta-dharma-
T11dhkvadnu:984: 03508 viparyayavati dṛṣṭānte virodhaḥ syāt. viruddhe ca dṛṣṭānte
T11dhkvadnu:986: 03510 viruddhas tadā hetv-ābhāsaḥ sādhāraṇāyām aprasādhite vā
T11dhkvadnu:989: 03513 kaścid hetu-doṣo dṛṣṭānta-virodhaś ca pratijñayā iti cet, na,
T11dhkvadnu:990: 03514 tad api saṃśaya-hetutva-anativṛtter dṛṣṭānta-virodho hi pratijñāyāḥ
T11dhkvadnu:995: 03517 api hetor na avyabhicāra-dharmatā śakyā darśayitum
T11dhkvadnu:997: 03519 tan na pratijñayā dṛṣṭānta-virodho hetv-ābhāsān ativartate.
T11dhkvadnu:998: 03601 ubhayathā api doṣo astv iti cet,
T11dhkvadnu:1002: 03604 hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ viruddhe dṛṣṭānte na sambhavati iti prāk
T11dhkvadnu:1003: 03605 prayuktasya hetor doṣeṇa parājaya iti na uttara-dṛṣṭānta-apekṣayā
T11dhkvadnu:1004: 03606 virodhaś cintām arhati. hetor api dṛṣṭānta-virodhe asādhāraṇatvaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1005: 03607 viruddhatvaṃ vā vaidharmye yadi vṛttiḥ syāt.
T11dhkvadnu:1011: 03612 sarva ete sādhana-virodhā hetv-ābhāseṣv eva antarbhavanti
T11dhkvadnu:1013: 03614 yat tu viruddham uttaraṃ para-pakṣe sva-siddhena gotva-ādinā
T11dhkvadnu:1015: tad asambaddham eva. yadi hi sva-siddhena
T11dhkvadnu:1017: 03617 tasya tat sva-pakṣa-viruddhaṃ na abhimatam iti virodha
T11dhkvadnu:1018: 03618 yujyeta. sa hi svayaṃ pratipanne gotve hetu-vṛtteḥ saṃśayāno
T11dhkvadnu:1019: 03619 apratipattim ātmanas tathā khyāpayati. sa ca hetuḥ
T11dhkvadnu:1021: 03701 anaikāntika eva prasādhite tu sāmarthye gotve
T11dhkvadnu:1022: 03702 avṛttyā hetor na saṃśaya eva sarva-saṃśaya-prakārāṇāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1027: 03706 saṃśaya-hetum eva āha iti. yat punar uktam ubhaya-pakṣa-sampratipannena
T11dhkvadnu:1031: 03709 asamarthite anyatra api tulyam iti na ubhaya-siddha-itarayor anaikāntikatvair
T11dhkvadnu:1035: 03712 tad-abhidhānena eva uktā iti na pṛthag nigrahasthāneṣu uktā iti,
T11dhkvadnu:1036: 03713 tad apy avayava-antara-vādino ayuktam. yo avayava-antaraṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1039: 03715 uktir vyāpyā tad-vacanena gamyamānasya tasmāt sādhana-antara-
T11dhkvadnu:1041: 03717 antarbhāvād dṛṣṭāntasya api hetāv antarbhāva iṣṭo bhavati,
T11dhkvadnu:1042: 03718 tathā ca na dṛṣṭāntaḥ pṛthak sādhana-avayavaḥ syād apṛthag-vṛtteḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:1043: 03719 yo dṛṣṭānta-sādhyo arthas tasya hetāv antarbhāvād
T11dhkvadnu:1044: 03720 hetunā eva sādhita iti na dṛṣṭāntasya pṛthak kiṃcit sāmarthyam.
T11dhkvadnu:1045: 03801 api ca na kiṃcit pūrva-pakṣa-vādino hetv-ābhāsa-asaṃsparṣe
T11dhkvadnu:1046: 03802 nyāyyaṃ nigrahasthānam asti iti tat-sambandhīni sarvāṇy
T11dhkvadnu:1047: 03803 eva hetv-ābhāsa-vacanena eva uktāni iti na pṛthag vācyāni
T11dhkvadnu:1048: 03804 syuḥ. artha-antara-gamana-āder api hetor asāmarthya eva sambhavāt.
T11dhkvadnu:1049: 03805 na hi samarthe hetau sādhye ca siddhe artha-antara-
T11dhkvadnu:1050: 03806 gamanaṃ kaścid ārabhate asamarthasya mithyā-pravṛtter iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1052: 03808 yaḥ pratijñātam artham anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād
T11dhkvadnu:1054: 03810 pratiṣedhe kṛte ka evam āha anityaḥ śabda iti parityajati,
T11dhkvadnu:1056: 03812 atra api yady udbhāvite api hetor vyabhicāre na sa pakṣaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1058: kiṃ na gṛhyeta. nigṛhīta eva hetv-ābhāsa-abhidhānād
T11dhkvadnu:1060: 03815 tasya tad eva adyaṃ nigrahasthānam iti kim anyair
T11dhkvadnu:1064: 03901 prapalāyitvaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam ity evam ādy api vācyaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1065: 03902 syāt, tasmād etad apy asambaddham iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1066: 03903 aviśeṣa-ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchato hetv-antaram.
T11dhkvadnu:1071: 03907 ca dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇam iti evaṃ pratyavasthita āha
T11dhkvadnu:1073: 03909 duḥkha-moha-samanvitaṃ hi idaṃ sarvaṃ vyaktaṃ parimitaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1075: 04001 prakṛtikatvam iti. tad idam aviśeṣa-ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1076: 04002 bruvato hetv-antaraṃ bhavati. sati ca hetv-antara-bhāve
T11dhkvadnu:1078: 04004 atra api pūrvasya eva hetor anaikāntikasya abhidhānān nigṛhīte
T11dhkvadnu:1087: 04011 prakṛtyāyāṃ kuryān nityaḥ śabdo asparśatvād iti hetuḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:1088: 04012 hetuś ca nāma hinoter dhātos tu-śabde pratyaye kṛd-antaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1089: 04013 padam. padaṃ ca nāma-ākhyāta-upasarga-nipātā iti prastutya
T11dhkvadnu:1097: 04101 samarthane kartavye tad akṛtvā aparasya prasaṅgena aprasaṅgena
T11dhkvadnu:1099: 04103 sthānam uttara-vādino api doṣa-udbhāvana-mātrād aparasya upakṣepa
T11dhkvadnu:1106: 04109 artha-siddhāv ānarthakyam. yad eva kiṃcid asādhana-aṅgasya
T11dhkvadnu:1114: 04114 iti vatir atra upāttaḥ so anyadā apy ananurūpaṃ gṛhnati ity
T11dhkvadnu:1117: 04116 evaṃ hi tā na pṛthag vācyā nirarthakena eva abhidhānāt.
T11dhkvadnu:1123: 04203 avādino api hi nirarthaka-abhidhāne kiṃ na nigraho nigraha-
T11dhkvadnu:1125: 04205 na, tasya iha aprastāvād iti cet,
T11dhkvadnu:1127: 04206 bravīti, tasya tena eva nigraha iti. tat tulyaṃ sarvasya asādhana-
T11dhkvadnu:1128: 04207 aṅga-vādina iti. sa sarvo nirarthaka-abhidhāyy anena eva
T11dhkvadnu:1130: 04209 na ca varṇa-krama-nirdeśaḥ sarvatra nirarthakaḥ kvacit-
T11dhkvadnu:1131: 04210 prakaraṇe tasya api arthavattvāt. tasmād atra eva asya ānarthakyāt
T11dhkvadnu:1133: 04212 api ca atyalpam idam ucyate varṇa-krama-nirdeśo nigrahasthānam
T11dhkvadnu:1137: 04216 avijñāta-artham. yad vākyaṃ parṣadā prativādinā ca trir-abhihitaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1143: 04302 na idaṃ nirarthakād bhidyate. sa yadi prakṛta-artha-sambaddhaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1146: 04304 jāḍyāt parṣad-ādayo na pratipadyanta iti na vidvān nigraham
T11dhkvadnu:1148: 04306 parṣat-prajñām aparikalpya vacanān nigraha-arha eva iti cet,
T11dhkvadnu:1149: 04307 nyāyavādino jāḍyād uktam ajānan kiṃ na prativādī nigṛhyate.
T11dhkvadnu:1150: 04308 jāḍyāt parṣad-āder avijñāta-pratipādana-asāmarthya iti vijetā na
T11dhkvadnu:1152: 04310 eva iti na pṛthag avijñāta-arthaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1154: 04312 anekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāparyeṇa yogo
T11dhkvadnu:1160: 04402 nirarthakāt pṛthag uktam nanv evam asambaddha-vākyam
T11dhkvadnu:1161: 04403 api pṛthag vācyaṃ syāt. na ubhaya-saṃgrahāt apārthakam,
T11dhkvadnu:1162: 04404 nirarthakasya api saṃgraha-prasaṅgāt. evaṃvidhāc ca viśeṣa-
T11dhkvadnu:1164: 04406 apy uktaḥ. na ca saṃgraha-nirdeśe kiṃcid doṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:1165: 04407 prabhede vā guṇa-antaram iti yat kiṃcid etat.
T11dhkvadnu:1170: 04411 na, evam api siddher iti cet,
T11dhkvadnu:1172: 04412 yathā gaur ity asya padasya arthe goṇī iti prayujyamānaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1173: 04413 padaṃ kakuda-ādimantam arthaṃ pratipādyati iti. na śabda-anvākhyānaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1174: 04414 vyartham, anena padena go-śabdam eva pratipadyate,
T11dhkvadnu:1179: tathā hi pūrvaṃ karma-upādīyate tataḥ karaṇaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1181: 04503 tad etad unmattasya unmatta-saṃvarṇanam iva prayoga-apeta-
T11dhkvadnu:1182: 04504 śabda-vad etad iti. yadi goṇī-śabdāt kakuda-ādimaty
T11dhkvadnu:1192: 04511 abhāvāt. yaḥ khalu ubhayaṃ vetti śabdam apaśabdaṃ ca, sa
T11dhkvadnu:1193: 04512 evaṃ pratipadyate. yas tu nakka-śabdaṃ mukka-śabdam eva
T11dhkvadnu:1196: 04514 tato arthaṃ pratipadyeta. dṛṣṭā ca anubhaya-vedino api
T11dhkvadnu:1198: 04516 arthe asamarthasya śabde api pratīti-janana-asāmarthyāc ca.
T11dhkvadnu:1199: 04517 na hy arthe api vācakatvaṃ nāma anyad eva tad-viṣaya-pratīti-
T11dhkvadnu:1200: 04518 jananāt. apaśabdaś cec śabde pratītiṃ janayet, artha eva
T11dhkvadnu:1201: 04519 kiṃ na janayati. na hy etasya arthāt kiṃcid bhayaṃ paśyāmo
T11dhkvadnu:1203: 04601 akṛta-samayasya śabde apy apratīti-jananāc ca. na hy
T11dhkvadnu:1204: 04602 ayam apaśabdaḥ śabde api svabhāvataḥ pratītiṃ janayaty
T11dhkvadnu:1205: 04603 adarśanāt, samayata eva tu janayet. samaya-vaśād vartamāno
T11dhkvadnu:1206: 04604 artha eva kiṃ na pravartate. evaṃ hi pratipatti-paraṃparā-
T11dhkvadnu:1209: 04607 apaśabdair eva bahulaṃ vyutpadyamānā loke dṛśyante
T11dhkvadnu:1212: 04610 ko ayaṃ śabdānāṃ saṃskāraḥ. na hy eṣāṃ prajñā-bāhu-śruty-
T11dhkvadnu:1215: 04612 śravyatā, na apy artha-pratyāyane kaścid atiśayaḥ. na
T11dhkvadnu:1220: 04616 na ca evaṃvidhān āgamān ādriyante yuktijñāḥ. na ca
T11dhkvadnu:1222: 04618 naraka-pātam iti bruvāṇasya kasyacin mukhaṃ vakrībhavati.
T11dhkvadnu:1223: 04619 tasmān na saṃskṛto nāma kaścic śabdaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:1226: 04702 ādi-guṇa-yuktāḥ. kaḥ punar eṣāṃ guṇa-utkarṣa-anapekṣo alīka-nirbandhaḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:1227: 04703 yat te amūn eva śabdān prayuñjate,
T11dhkvadnu:1229: 04704 ca atra kaścic śabde parokṣaḥ sākṣī,
T11dhkvadnu:1231: 04705 prayuñjate nāma śiṣṭāḥ. nanv evaṃ vayaṃ guṇa-atiśayam
T11dhkvadnu:1237: 04709 saty api guṇa atiśaye na karaṇīya eva anvākhyāne yatnaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:1243: 04713 tathā eva pratipadyate tāsāṃ ca prayoga-bhraṃśam tathā
T11dhkvadnu:1244: 04714 saṃskṛtānāṃ śabdānāṃ pratītir bhaviṣyati iti. jaḍa-pravṛttir
T11dhkvadnu:1245: 04715 eva eṣā, yā śabdānāṃ lakṣaṇe pravṛttiḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:1246: 04801 avayava-viparyaye api yadi teṣāṃ vacanānāṃ sambandha-pratītir, na
T11dhkvadnu:1247: 04802 viparyayo na apy artha-apratītiḥ sāmarthyāt. na hy atra kaścit
T11dhkvadnu:1248: 04803 samayaḥ pratyāyana-aviśeṣe apy evam eva avayavāḥ prayoktavyā
T11dhkvadnu:1250: 04805 sa eva teṣāṃ kramo yathāvasthitebhyo artha-pratītir bhavati iti
T11dhkvadnu:1254: 04808 yeṣāṃ śabdānāṃ kaścit sambandho jāyate, idam iha
T11dhkvadnu:1255: 04809 sambadhyata iti teṣu vidita-sambandheṣu kaḥ kasya pūrvo
T11dhkvadnu:1260: 04812 sambandhaḥ pratīyate. na hi vākyeṣu padānāṃ krama-niyamaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:1263: 04814 padair artha-parisamāptiḥ tadā ekaṃ vākyam, yathā
T11dhkvadnu:1264: 04815 devadatta gām ānaya kṛṣṇām iti. atra padānāṃ yathākāmaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1265: 04816 prayoge api na artha-pratītau viśeṣa iti kaścit krama-abhiniveśaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:1267: 04819 pratītir bhaviṣyati iti pratīyamāna-arthasya ca śabdasya prayoge
T11dhkvadnu:1271: 04902 sambandhaḥ pradarśyeta iti na niyamaḥ kaścid ubhayathā api
T11dhkvadnu:1272: 04903 pratīty-utpatter ity uktam. apratīyamāna-sambandheṣu ca padeṣu
T11dhkvadnu:1273: 04904 na tebhya ānupūrvyā api pratītir iti na idam apārthakād
T11dhkvadnu:1275: na aprāptakālaṃ pṛthag vācyaṃ syād iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1276: 04906 hīnam anyatamena apy avayavena nyūnam. yasmin vākye
T11dhkvadnu:1277: 04907 pratijñā-ādīnām anyatamo avayavo na bhavati, tad vākyaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1279: 04909 na pratijñā-nyūnaṃ hīnaṃ tad-abhāve pratīti-bhāvād iti
T11dhkvadnu:1280: 04910 pratipāditam. hīnam eva tat nyūnatāyām api nigrahād ity
T11dhkvadnu:1281: 04911 aparaḥ. yaḥ pratīyamāna-artham anarthakaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte,
T11dhkvadnu:1282: 04912 sa nigraham arhet. na artha-upasaṃhitasya abhidhātā ity
T11dhkvadnu:1283: 04913 asamīkṣita-abhidhānam etat. ata eva ca pratijñāyā na sādhana-
T11dhkvadnu:1286: 04916 ānarthakyam iti tad etan niyama-abhyupagame veditavyam.
T11dhkvadnu:1290: 04920 tu na kaścid doṣo niyama-abhāvād iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1292: 05002 śabda-punaruktam anityaḥ śabdo anityaḥ śabda iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1295: 05005 atra na śabda-punaruktaṃ pṛthag vācyam artha-punarukta-
T11dhkvadnu:1296: 05006 vacanena eva gatatvāt. na hy artha-bhede śabda-sāmye api
T11dhkvadnu:1298: 05008 hasati hasati svāminy uccai rudaty atiroditi /
T11dhkvadnu:1302: 05012 yathā vā yad yasmin bhavati bhavati,
T11dhkvadnu:1308: 05016 artha-punaruktena eva gata-arthatvāt na pṛthag vācyam. ayam
T11dhkvadnu:1309: 05017 api niyata-sādhana vākya eva doṣo vaktavyaḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:1316: na ayaṃ gurur na śiṣya iti na yatnataḥ
T11dhkvadnu:1318: yena punaḥ punar ucyata iti punarvacane
T11dhkvadnu:1327: 05106 na ca idam adhikād bhidyata iti na pṛthag vācyam. viniyata-
T11dhkvadnu:1328: 05107 pada-prayoge hi sādhana-vākye ādhikya-doṣa iti punarvacane
T11dhkvadnu:1334: 05113 doṣa iti ādhikya-punarvacanayos tulya-doṣa iti saṃgraha-
T11dhkvadnu:1338: 05115 bhedānāṃ vacane ca atiprasaṅgād ity uktam.
T11dhkvadnu:1339: 05116 paryāya-śabda-kalpo hy aparo hetur eka-hetu-pratipādite viṣaye
T11dhkvadnu:1357: 05211 uttareṇa avasānān na idaṃ nigrahasthānam iti cet, syād
T11dhkvadnu:1358: 05212 etat, uttareṇa guṇa-doṣavatā mūḍha-amūḍhatvaṃ gamyata iti
T11dhkvadnu:1359: 05213 kiṃ punar-uccāritena. asti hi kaścid uttare samartho na pratyuccāraṇe,
T11dhkvadnu:1360: 05214 na asau tāvatā nigraham arhed iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1361: 05215 na, uttara-viṣaya-aparijñānāt. yady ayaṃ na pratyuccārayati,
T11dhkvadnu:1362: 05216 nirviṣayam uttaraṃ prasajyeta. atha uttaraṃ bravīti,
T11dhkvadnu:1363: 05217 kathaṃ na uccārayati. tad idaṃ vyāhatam ucyate,
T11dhkvadnu:1365: 05301 uttaraṃ ca bravīti iti. apratijñānāc ca. na ca idaṃ pratijñāyate,
T11dhkvadnu:1387: 05316 upakṣepaḥ, tad avaśyaṃ sādhana-aṅga-viṣayatvād dūṣaṇena upadarśyata
T11dhkvadnu:1388: 05317 eva. tatra api na sarvaṃ prāg anukrameṇa uccāritavyam,
T11dhkvadnu:1389: 05318 paścād dūṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ dvir uccāraṇa-prasaṅgāt. dūṣaṇa-
T11dhkvadnu:1392: na kāryam eva dūṣayatā asya ayaṃ doṣa
T11dhkvadnu:1394: 05404 kriyata eva. na hi sarva-viṣaya-upadarśanaṃ kṛtvā yugapad
T11dhkvadnu:1401: 05408 tasmin dūṣite punar anyo artho apara-doṣa-viṣaya ity
T11dhkvadnu:1402: 05409 ayam anubhāṣaṇe dūṣaṇe ca nyāyaḥ. sakṛt-sarva-anubhāṣaṇe
T11dhkvadnu:1403: 05410 api doṣa-vacana-kāle punar viṣayaḥ pradarśanīya eva,
T11dhkvadnu:1405: 05411 doṣasya vaktum aśakyatvāt. tathā ca dvir-anubhāṣaṇaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1406: 05412 kṛtaṃ syāt. tatra prathamaṃ sarva-anukrama-anubhāṣaṇaṃ niṣprayojanam.
T11dhkvadnu:1407: 05413 dūṣaṇa-vādinā dūṣaṇe vaktavye yan na tatra upayujyate,
T11dhkvadnu:1408: 05414 tasya abhidhānam adoṣa-udbhāvanaṃ dvir-uktiś ca iti
T11dhkvadnu:1413: 05417 iti. tatra sādhane yataḥ kutaścit prasaṅga-ādinā
T11dhkvadnu:1416: 05420 na prasajyate. na api tat tasya anubhāṣaṇīyam,
T11dhkvadnu:1421: kiṃ tu dūṣayatā avaśyaṃ viṣayo darśanīyo
T11dhkvadnu:1423: 05501 evaṃ tarhi na ananubhāṣaṇaṃ pṛthag nigrahasthānaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1426: 05503 apratibhā. na ca uttara-viṣayam apradarśayann uttaraṃ pratipattuṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1430: 05507 eva, gavi vihitam iva sāsnā-ādimattvaṃ bāhuleye api. tasmād
T11dhkvadnu:1433: 05510 kaś ca ayaṃ samaya-niyamas trir-abhihitasya ananubhāṣaṇam
T11dhkvadnu:1434: 05511 iti. yadi tāvat para-pratipādana-arthā pravṛttiḥ, kiṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1435: 05512 trir abhidhīyeta. tathā tathā sa grāhaṇīyaḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:1443: 05601 vimūḍhas tūṣṇīṃbhavati. na hi para-upatāpana-krame kaścin
T11dhkvadnu:1445: 05603 trir-abhidhānaṃ vā vidhīyate. na ca para-upatāpāya santaḥ pravartante
T11dhkvadnu:1446: 05604 śāstrāṇi vā praṇīyante ity ado vaktavyam. tasmāt
T11dhkvadnu:1452: 05608 avijñātaṃ ca ajñānam. vijñātaṃ parṣadā prativādinā yad
T11dhkvadnu:1453: 05609 avijñātam, tad ajñānaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam. arthe khalv
T11dhkvadnu:1454: 05610 avijñāte na tasya pratiṣedhaṃ brūyād iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1455: 05611 etad apy ananubhāṣaṇa-vad apratibhayā eva gamyatvād
T11dhkvadnu:1457: 05613 pratipattir aśakyā iti anuttara-pratipattyā eva nigrahasthānatvam
T11dhkvadnu:1463: 05701 ca uttaraṃ brūyād iti viṣaya-ajñānam uttara-jñānaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1466: 05703 artho hi na anubhāṣet. ananubhāṣamāṇo viṣayam
T11dhkvadnu:1467: 05704 apradarśya-uttaraṃ pratipattuṃ na śaknuyād iti uttaraṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1470: 05707 tad-abhāve pratipattir bhavaty eva iti tayoḥ pṛthag vacane
T11dhkvadnu:1474: 05710 na uttara-ajñānam ajñānaṃ kiṃ tarhi viṣaya-ajñānam, ajñāte
T11dhkvadnu:1475: 05711 hi viṣaye uttara-ajñānāt tan na pratipadyeta iti asti viṣayo apratibhāyā
T11dhkvadnu:1476: 05712 iti cet, evaṃ tarhy ananubhāṣaṇaṃ nirviṣayam,
T11dhkvadnu:1477: 05713 ajñānena ākṣepāt. na hi viṣayaṃ samyak pratipadyamānaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:1478: 05714 kaścin na anubhāṣeta iti na ananubhāṣaṇaṃ pṛthag vācyam.
T11dhkvadnu:1479: 05715 uttara-ajñānasya ca ākṣepāt. viṣaya-ajñānena uttara-ajñānam apy
T11dhkvadnu:1480: 05716 ākṣiptam eva. na hi viṣayam ajānann uttaraṃ jānāti iti na eva apratibhāyā
T11dhkvadnu:1482: 05801 jñāte api viṣaye punar uttara-ajñānam apratibhāyā viṣaya
T11dhkvadnu:1483: 05802 iti cet, evaṃ tarhi viṣaya-uttara-ajñānayor api prabhedān nigrahasthāna-
T11dhkvadnu:1484: 05803 antarāṇi vācyāni. yathā ajñānasya viṣaya-ajñānam uttara-
T11dhkvadnu:1485: 05804 ajñānam iti prabhedād asaty api guṇa-atiśaye nigrahasthāna-
T11dhkvadnu:1488: 05806 ajñānam ity ādi-prabhedān nigrahasthāna-antarāṇi kiṃ na ucyante.
T11dhkvadnu:1489: 05807 na ca ubhayasya apy ajñānasya saṃgraha-vacane kaścid
T11dhkvadnu:1490: 05808 doṣaḥ, guṇas tu syād iti saṃgraha-vacanaṃ nyāyyam.
T11dhkvadnu:1492: 05810 pṛthag-vacanam. api ca na pūrva-uttara-vādino hetv-ābhāsā-pratibhābhyām
T11dhkvadnu:1494: 05812 vacanena eva sarvam uktam iti. tad-ubhaya-ākṣipteṣu prabhedeṣu
T11dhkvadnu:1504: 05901 kārya-vyāsaṅgāt kathā-vicchedo vikṣepaḥ. yat kiṃcit kartavyaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1510: 05904 me kaṇṭhaṃ kṣiṇoty evam-ādinā kathāṃ vicchinatti, sa vikṣepo
T11dhkvadnu:1513: 05907 idam apy yadi pūrvapakṣa-vādī kuryād vyāja-upakṣepa-mātreṇa,
T11dhkvadnu:1516: 05910 vikṣepaḥ syāt. tathā ca idam artha-antara-gamana eva antarbhaved
T11dhkvadnu:1519: 05913 na bhidyate. atiprasaṅgaś ca evaṃprakārāṇām asambaddha-
T11dhkvadnu:1521: 06002 vyavasthāpane proktaḥ. atha uttarapakṣa-vādy evaṃ vikṣipet,
T11dhkvadnu:1522: 06003 tasya api sādhana-anantaram uttare pratipattavye tad-apratipattyā
T11dhkvadnu:1524: 06006 nanu na avaśyaṃ sādhana-dūṣaṇābhyām eva sarvasya pratipattir,
T11dhkvadnu:1526: 06008 hetv-ābhāseṣv apratibhāyāṃ vā antarbhavet. bhavati hi anibaddhena
T11dhkvadnu:1529: 06010 ekatra adhikaraṇe viruddha-abhyupagamayor vivādaḥ syāt, aviruddha-
T11dhkvadnu:1540: 06101 dvayaṃ na atipatati. etena eva vitaṇḍā pratyukta-abhyupagama-
T11dhkvadnu:1542: 06103 yadā tarhy abhyupagamya vādaṃ viphalatayā na kiṃcid
T11dhkvadnu:1543: 06104 vakti, anyad vā yat kiṃcit pralapati,
T11dhkvadnu:1546: 06106 anabhidhāna anya-abhidhānayor api parājaya eva ity uktam
T11dhkvadnu:1548: 06108 punaruktasya ca pratijñā-āder vacanasya ca nigrahasthānatvaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1555: 06114 yaḥ pareṇa coditaṃ doṣam anuddhṛtya, bhavato
T11dhkvadnu:1563: 06201 atra api yadi puruṣatvāc cauro bhavān api syāt,
T11dhkvadnu:1566: tasmān na ayaṃ caurya-hetur iti yady
T11dhkvadnu:1571: 06205 prasaṅgam antareṇa āñjasena eva kiṃ na vyabhicārita iti
T11dhkvadnu:1573: santi hy evaṃprakārā api vyavahārā loka
T11dhkvadnu:1574: 06207 iti. atha tad upakṣepam abhyupagacchaty eva, tadā apy
T11dhkvadnu:1579: 06210 eva uttara-apratipattir iti tāvatā eva pūrvam āpanna-nigrahasya
T11dhkvadnu:1584: 06214 nigraha-prāpto asi ity ananuyogaḥ. etac ca kasya parājaya
T11dhkvadnu:1588: 06301 atra api yadi sādhana-vādinaṃ nigraha-prāptam uttara-vādī
T11dhkvadnu:1590: apratibhā eva asya uttara-apratipatter iti na
T11dhkvadnu:1592: 06304 punar na dvayor ekasya api atra jaya-parājayau, sādhana-
T11dhkvadnu:1597: 06308 arhati eva, sarvasya sato doṣasya anudbhāvanād iti cet, na
T11dhkvadnu:1598: 06309 santa iti kṛtvā sarve doṣā avaśyaṃ vaktavyā avacane vā
T11dhkvadnu:1601: 06311 yathā ekasya artha-asya aneka-sādhana-sadbhāve apy ekena eva
T11dhkvadnu:1602: 06312 tat-siddher na sarva-upādānam iti na doṣam udbhāvayann eva aparasya
T11dhkvadnu:1606: tadā tayor nyāyena na ekasya api pūrvavaj
T11dhkvadnu:1611: 06407 evam api na paryanuyojya-upekṣaṇaṃ nāma parājaya-adhikaraṇam
T11dhkvadnu:1615: 06411 asi iti bruvan niranuyojya-anuyogān nigṛhīto vaktavyaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:1616: 06412 atra api yadi tat-sādhana-vādinam abhūtair doṣair uttara-
T11dhkvadnu:1619: 06414 udbhāvayitā na bhavati. tathā ca bhūta-doṣa-udbhāvana-lakṣaṇasya
T11dhkvadnu:1621: 06501 apratibhayā eva nigṛhīta iti na idam ato nigrahasthāna-antaram.
T11dhkvadnu:1625: 06505 doṣatve pratipādite sādhana-ābhāsa-vacanena eva nigṛhīta iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1626: 06506 evam api na idaṃ hetv-ābhāsebhyo bhidyate. avaśyaṃ hi
T11dhkvadnu:1639: 06602 eka-prakṛtir iti. sa evam uktavān paryanuyujyate.
T11dhkvadnu:1640: 06603 atha prakṛtir vikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣayitavyam iti. yasya avasthitasya
T11dhkvadnu:1647: 06608 sad-asatoś ca tirobhāva-āvirbhāvāv antareṇa na kasyacit pravṛtty-
T11dhkvadnu:1648: 06609 uparamaḥ pravṛttir vā iti evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sata
T11dhkvadnu:1653: 06612 iha api na kaścid aniyamāt kathā-prasaṅgaḥ yat tena upagatan
T11dhkvadnu:1655: na sad vinaśyati iti tasya samarthanāya
T11dhkvadnu:1656: 06614 idam uktam eka-prakṛtikam idaṃ vyaktam anvaya-darśanād
T11dhkvadnu:1657: 06615 iti. tatra ekā prakṛtiḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohaḥ. tad-avibhakta-
T11dhkvadnu:1661: 06703 vināśāv iti siddhaṃ bhavati. atra tad-uktasya hetor doṣam
T11dhkvadnu:1666: 06707 dharmakam, na tathā sukha-ādayaḥ. vyaktasya sukha-ādy-anvaye
T11dhkvadnu:1669: 06709 virodhād iti. sukha-ādy-anvaya-darśanād ity asiddho hetur
T11dhkvadnu:1670: 06711 iti. evaṃ hi tasya sādhana-doṣa-udbhāvanena pakṣo dūṣito
T11dhkvadnu:1671: 06712 bhavati. so anupasaṃhṛtya sādhana-doṣaṃ kathāṃ pratānayan
T11dhkvadnu:1673: 06714 ayam eva doṣo anena prakaraṇena ucyata iti cet,
T11dhkvadnu:1675: 06715 viṣayaḥ, na lokaḥ śabdair apratipāditam arthaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1676: 06716 pratipattuṃ samartha iti. sa eva ayaṃ bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyo
T11dhkvadnu:1677: 06717 atra api. yathoktena nyāyena pūrvakasya asādhana-aṅgasya asiddhasya
T11dhkvadnu:1680: 06719 kathā-prasaṅgād iti. idam api hetv-ābhāseṣv antarbhāvān na
T11dhkvadnu:1682: 06801 hetv-ābhāsāś ca yathoktāḥ. hetv-ābhāsāś ca nigrahasthānāni.
T11dhkvadnu:1686: 06804 ity ata āha yathokta-hetv-ābhāsa-lakṣaṇena eva nigrahasthāna-
T11dhkvadnu:1688: 06806 atra api yathoktaṃ kṛtvā cintyam eva,
T11dhkvadnu:1690: 06807 tathā eva, āhosvid anyathā iti. tat tu cintyamānam
T11dhkvadnu:1691: 06808 iha atiprasajyata iti na pratanyate. hetv-ābhāsāś ca yathānyāyaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1695: 06812 tattva-ālokaṃ timirayati taṃ durvidagdho jano ayaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1696: 06813 tasmād yatnaḥ kṛta iha mayā tat-samujjvālanāya //3//
